name: The stranger from the bus stop
name_original: The stranger from the bus stop
description:
Possible trigger warnings : mild blood in a CG, stalking theme. Please be aware of these warnings before to play this game. The opinions and behaviors expressed by the characters are not endorsed by the developer.

____________________________________________

A visual novel inspired of dating sim style and psychological/horror games tropes.

You met a cute stranger at the bus stop <3

- You were living a boring life until one day you decided to make efforts to be a better person and care a little bit about people. You met a creepy  guy at the bus stop and it was kinda weird. After that, numbers appearing on your door and you don't know why. Will a strange encounter at the bus stop turn into a love story? (spoil : no)

Game Features: 

- 4 ENDINGS

- 4 CGs

- Gender-neutral MC

This is a game intended to be short (like 10-15 minutes). I personally recommend to get all the endings to understand the whole story. (Every choice is important so)

______________________________________________________________

However, english is not my first language. If some parts of the story are dull, It was not my intention.

I forgot to choice english for the launcher, so the “help” and “about” are in french.

I used dova syndrome songs and backgrounds / sounds with no royalties.
